txt.en: Heshra has asked you to investigate the marsh east of Khûtra near the shore for anything unusual.
Return to the herbalist Heshra in the Elder Hall.
Investigate suspicious areas in the marsh
Investigated suspicious areas in the marsh ([placeholder]/3)
'Please, hurry and investigate the marsh. It may prove key to fighting this dreadful disease.'
Heshra is investigating the source of the disease afflicting Khûtra. He has asked you to investigate the marsh near Khûtra for anything unusual.

'I think I might have something. It's hard to tell... much of what they ate is now mush. One of the few things these animals all share is honeywort in their stomachs.

'There is a marsh to the east of here along the shore that is thick with the stuff. Hopefully you will find more answers there.

'There must be some malady or evil presence causing this disease that emanates from there. Please, go there and see what you can find.'
Investigate suspicious areas around the marsh
'A dead end. That is quite unfortunate. Still, we must try to heal these animals, and our people, regardless.'
